https://tmrev.io/movie/84190-Detropia 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/c6YDKJK4ulbk9GdwtbGMbnIKJeD.jpg Detroit’s story has encapsulated the iconic narrative of America over the last century – the Great Migration of African Americans escaping Jim Crow; the rise of manufacturing and the middle class; the love affair with automobiles; the flowering of the American dream; and now… the collapse of the economy and the fading American mythos. Detropia
